main.name: Srushti Shah
main.occupation: AI/ML Engineer & MS Computer Engineering @ NYU
main.description: Building production-grade ML systems, AI agents, and data platforms for measurable impact.
main.bio: I am an AI/ML engineer and Computer Engineering graduate student at New York University. At Stardog Union, I integrated the CARTE ML system into Voicebox3, built an automated scoring framework, engineered a 100M+ row graph-ingestion pipeline, and optimized lineage and inference performance for LangChain and PyTorch Geometric workloads. I previously shipped React features and tests for client sites at Cabbagesoft Technologies and delivered GPU-accelerated air-quality research at Bhaskaracharya National Institute for Space Applications and Geo-Informatics. I love designing reliable AI agents, scalable data workflows, and intuitive user experiences that turn complex ideas into results.
main.contactmessage: Let’s collaborate on AI agents, data lineage, or production-ready ML platforms.

resume.skillmessage: Core tools I use to build reliable ML platforms, AI agents, and full-stack experiences.

education.school: New York University, New York, NY
education.description: GPA: 3.63/4.00. Coursework: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, MLOps, Data Science for Business, Natural Language Processing.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering, Information and Communication Technology
education.description: GPA: 8.49/10. Coursework: Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Data Mining & Business Intelligence, Big Data Analytics, Software Engineering, Data Structures & Algorithms.

work.title: Engineering Intern
work.description: Integrated the CARTE ML system into Voicebox3 for natural language-driven predictive analytics, built a 6-point scoring framework for evaluation and A/B testing, and engineered a 100M+ row ingestion pipeline directly into Stardog RDF graphs and PyTorch Geometric formats. Optimized lineage computation to sub-second responses and improved inference throughput via CPU-optimized ensemble execution and environment-level threading controls.

work.title: Software Development Intern - Frontend
work.description: Shipped 5+ production React features with Hooks, Router, and Bootstrap, improving delivery speed by 20%. Implemented unit and integration tests that reduced post-deployment bugs by 30% while resolving most GitLab merge conflicts independently and contributing to UX reviews.

work.company: Bhaskaracharya National Institute for Space Applications and Geo-Informatics
work.title: Research Intern
work.description: Preprocessed and modeled air-quality data from 146 Indian cities (2013–2022), achieving MAE 0.661 across regression models. Configured CUDA/cuDNN to cut model training time from 3 hours to 30 minutes, enabling faster experimentation.

projects.title: AI Compliance & Risk Review System
projects.category: Multi-agent compliance, risk scoring, and reporting with Next.js dashboard and PostgreSQL backend.

projects.title: Restaurant Recommender System
projects.category: FastAPI service for content-based restaurant suggestions with Dockerized deployment and monitoring.

projects.title: BookMyShow Clone
projects.category: React booking experience with reusable UI components and responsive layout.

projects.title: Giphy Search App
projects.category: Searchable GIF explorer built with React, debounced queries, and API integrations.
